name: Journey To The Root
description: Journey To The Root is a unique and exciting platformer game featuring a fox protagonist who can read files from the filesystem. In this game, players take on the role of the fox and navigate through levels created from the contents of the file system. The fox must jump and dodge obstacles while collecting essential data files, unlocking new abilities, and access to new levels. With charming graphics, fast-paced gameplay, and innovative use of the file system, Journey To The Root offers a one-of-a-kind gaming experience. Get ready to embark on a digital journey like no other to reach THE ROOT FOLDER!
